name: Dungeon Of Confusion
description:
Welcome to a failed Game Jam game! But hey, it's here to play. I think the concept, had I had time to build it out, could have been really fun. Sadly, this is just a base level with no props, enemies, or interesting gameplay elements of any kind.  There are however some keys you can find that do have a purpose, and there is an end to the game.

My theme for this jam was generated as Playstation One Styled, 3D Platformer Maze. I am not amazing at 3D models, and I work in Unreal Engine, so most things I have access to are too nice looking to be in a Playstation One styled game. I struggled for the entire first day trying to make some art until I decided to just use what I had. I put a level together the following day, decided it looked too good, and scrapped it.

After messing around with art for most of the second day I came to the realization that I could make good art look bad with a filter, but most of my time was already gone at this point and I had absolutely no progress. What you are playing here is a game that was actually made in about 6 hours, either way, enjoy!

Credits:
Programming and Level Design: DeepFriedOreo
All art and music in this project was purchased and is licensed through the Unreal Marketplace.

!Music may be loud. No in-game controls for sound available!
